title: Bloomberg Markets: Jabusch on Investing in Sustainability
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Jabusch on Investing in Sustainability
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Garvin Jabusch Co-Founder and Chief Investment Officer Green Alpha Advisor Discussing discuss investing in sustainable industries including electric vehicles.
